front.title: Layer Two Tunnelling Protocol : ATM access network extensions.

abstract.t: The L2TP working draft describes a protocol which permits the tunnelling of the link layer of PPP. This document augments the procedures described in the L2TP working draft to support ATM SVC or PVC based access networks. The necessary extensions to the L2TP working draft are defined in order to allow for asymmetric bi- directional call establishment in the access network.
